channel.title: About on Shilei Liu (刘石磊)
channel.description: Recent content in About on Shilei Liu (刘石磊)

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am currently a postgraduate in Northeastern University, and mainly focus on natural language processing. At present, I work on projects related with dialogue generation, machine reading comprehension and knowledge graph. Education [2019.09 - Now] Northeastern University (China), Computer Science and Technology. [2015.09 - 2019.07] Shandong Agricultural University, Computer Science and Technology. News [2021.08] Two papers were accepted by EMNLP 2021 and NLPCC 2021. [2020.06] Ranked third in the machine reading comprehension task of 2020 Language and Intelligence Challenge.
